amendment.description: An amendment numbered 22 printed in Part B of House Report 118-30 to create a national strategy for America to re-shore mineral supply chains and challenge the CCP.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Westerman amendment (A022) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A022) offered by Mr. Westerman.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Westerman amendment (A022) Agreed to by voice vote.
